headline: 3 Investment Management Stocks to Buy as Industry Gains Momentum
summary: While rising expenses and pressure on margins are near-term woes for the Investment Management industry, rising AUM balance and demand for higher-yielding investment vehicles will aid SEI Investments (SEIC), Invesco (IVZ) and Artisan Partners (APAM).

raw.headline: 3 Investment Management Stocks to Buy as Industry Gains Momentum

headline: Invesco Launches the Invesco MSCI North America Climate ETF (KLMN)
summary: Invesco Ltd. (NYSE: IVZ), a leading global asset management firm, announced the launch of the Invesco MSCI North America Climate ETF (KLMN). KLMN began trading on the New York Stock Exchange with US$2.4 billion in assets from Finnish pension insurer, Varma, which breaks a worldwide record by surpassing the funding of any previous new ETF launch globally.
